data.name: Web

data.name: React
data.description: React is a sophisticated framework from Facebook (2013) with a huge community, large ecosystem and active development.

data.name: Angular
data.description: In terms of web-development Angular is an already old framework. Initially released in 2010 as "AngularJS" by Google, it was completely rewritten with the version 2.0 and called just Angular
